name: autodidactic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to someone learning bythemselves, rather than being taught by a teacher: autodidactic learning He became an autodidactic scholar of Chinese science. See
autodidact
More examplesFewer examplesThe novel tells the story of an autodidactic warehouse worker. Both lawyers have an autodidactic streak and an obsession with political history. When it comes to skiing technique, I am stubbornly autodidactic: I took only one lesson as a beginner.My autodidactic impulse was encouraged by well-meaning people at the library.
